catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Miscellany (Biblical commentaries, poetry, halakhah)
author: Levi ben Gershom
description: Contents: Naḥmanides, Commentary on the Book of Job (ff. 1r-71r). Levi Ben Gershom, Commentary on Proverbs (ff. 73r-138r). Meir Abulafia, Poems (ff. 139r-141v). Meir Abulafia, Poems (ff. 141v-143v). Liḳuṭe derashot (ff. 143v-161r). Eliyah ben Yitsḥaḳ ibn Yiśraʾel (?), Gevir shevaʿ ṿe-nasi beyn atsilim: Laws of Shekhitah in rhymes (ff. 161v-166v). Pi mudaḥ...al-kitab (f. 167). Ḳatsid Pi Elzahad (f. 168). Abraham ben Meïr Ibn Ezra, Commentary on the Writings (Esther) (ff. 169r-174r). Hilkhot shiṭah ṿe-ṭerefot al derekh sheʾelot u-teshuvot (ff. 176r-182r).
